com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model.Attack

Packages that use Attack 
Package Description
com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2  
com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model  

  • Uses of Attack in com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2

    Methods in com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2 with parameters of type Attack 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    private java.lang.String CharacterGame.reportCombat​(Character combatant, Attack attack, AttackReport report)
    This method generates a report on how a character performed, with the combatant details, what attack they generated, how they defended.

  • Uses of Attack in com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model

    Subclasses of Attack in com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model 
    Modifier and Type Class Description
    class  FireAttack
    class FireAttack is a sub class of Attack, which will be implemented by the object instance from class RedDragon
    class  FrostAttack
    class FrostAttack is a sub class of Attack, which will be implemented by the object instance from class RedDragon and BlueDragon
    class  MagicAttack
    class MagicAttack is a sub class of Attack, which will be implemented by the object instance from class BlueDragon
    Methods in com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model that return Attack 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Attack BlueDragon.attack()
    attack() method is overrided by the class BlueDragon, it will return subclass of the class Attack, in this case, there are 80% chances to return MagicAttack's object, and 20% to return FrostAttack; both MagicAttack and FrostAttack will set the damage value as 4*D12;
    abstract Attack Character.attack()
    This method generates an Attack from this character, it uses strength + (1 to 8 inclusive) for the damage calculation.
    Attack RedDragon.attack()
    attack() method is overrided by the class RedDragon, it will return subclass of the class Attack, in this case, there are 70% chances to return MagicAttack's object, and 30% to return FireAttack; both MagicAttack's and FireAttack's damages are: 3 * D20,
    Methods in com.algonquincollege.cst8284.assignment2.model with parameters of type Attack 
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    AttackReport BlueDragon.defend​(Attack attack)
    This method is overided.
    abstract AttackReport Character.defend​(Attack attack)
    This method processes an Attack made against this character, to determine if full damage was taken or if the damage was reduced or increased.
    AttackReport RedDragon.defend​(Attack attack)
    This method is overided.
